channel.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_External_Binding_Verisign data type contains information about a single VeriSign external binding. The external binding information is used when a SoftLayer customer logs into the SoftLayer customer portal to authenticate them against a 3rd party, in this case VeriSign. The information provided by the VeriSign external binding data type includes: * The type of credential * The current state of the credential ** Enabled ** Disabled ** Locked * The credential’s expiration date * The last time the credential was updated
